Error 404 en {"@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"WebSite","name":"","url":"","potentialAction":{"@type":"SearchAction","target":"search?q={search_term_string}","query-input":"required name=search_term_string"}} /*! => Theme Name: Material => Theme URI: https://www.zkreations.com => Author: Daniel => Author URI: https://fb.com/daniei.abel => License: Creative Commons Atribucin-NoComercial 4.0 Internacional => License URI: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/ */ /*Deleted: unnecessary elements*/ .singleton-element:not(.cookie-choices-info), .item-control.blog-admin, .widget-item-control{display: none;} /*Fix: Blogger lightbox*/ .CSS_LIGHTBOX{z-index: 90001 !important;} /*Fix: Blogger image responsive*/ a[imageanchor],a[imageanchor] img{margin:0!important;height:auto!important} /*Fix: Comment Editor*/ #comment-editor{border: 0;width: 100%;min-height: 220px;} /*Fix: fb responsive hack ?= google plus hack */ .fb-comments,.fb-comments iframe span[style], .fb-comments iframe[style],.fb-comments span, .fb-like-box,.fb-like-box iframe span[style], .fb-like-box iframe[style],.fb-like-box span, .cmt_iframe_holder, .cmt_iframe_holder > iframe {width:100%!important} /*Design: is Layout Mode*/ body#layout .left{float: left;width: 40%;} body#layout .right{float: left;width: 60%;} /* Variable definitions ==================== */ /* Fondo y Header ========================================================================== */ /** * 1. Elige entre "repeat" y "no-repeat" para no repetir el fondo * 2. Imagen del header */ body { background-repeat: repeat; /* 1 */ background-position: top center; } .header__head { background-image: url(https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qQ30wgvLc7s/WbeikbfKs-I/AAAAAAAAC3A/0wFPMDnWxj4jlRtXoKSUx6eaaPRywiDIACLcBGAs/s1600/hg-01-dark.jpg); /* 2 */ background-position: center center; } /* Fuentes del texto ========================================================================== */ /** * 1. Fuente del texto global */ body { font-family: '$(mainfont.family)', sans-serif; /* 1 */ } /* Color principal y enlaces ========================================================================== */ /** * 1. Color de fondo * 2. Color principal * 3. Color de los enlaces */ body { background-color: $bgcolor; /* 1 */ } .color, .md-aside__profile, .header__head, .card .card__content.card__content--popular, .head__descripcion, .widget input[type=submit], .widget input[type=button] { background-color: $maincolor; /* 2 */ } .md-aside::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background-color: $maincolor; /* 2 */ } a, .blog__title i, .social__link, .md-aside__menu--link.is-active, .copyright__content a { color: $textcolor; /* 3 */ } /* Cover y avatar ========================================================================== */ /** * 1. Cover del widget Perfil * 2. Avatar de los comentarios anonimos */ .Profile .widget-content::before, .md-aside__profile { /* 1 */ background-image: url(https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YJMgVXrFjbI/WbdWCzgz8lI/AAAAAAAAC2g/YkzHzFykKwEQ0TOtnno9o6As-oyxak5KACLcBGAs/s1600/cover-mask.png); } .avatar-image-container { /* 2 */ background-image: url(https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AK9ctxSv1FM/WbilN_f2DBI/AAAAAAAAC4g/RJE0i7qenCcp6lTNGJdJA7ufzM_4wNtMgCLcBGAs/s1600/anon.png); } /*Custom css ==>*/ No disponible true false Multiple users
